timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/container/restart_count'
| align delta(2m)
| every 2m
| group_by
    [resource.project_id, resource.location, resource.cluster_name,
     resource.container_name],
    [value_restart_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.restart_count)]

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/restart_count'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| align delta(2m)
| every 2m
| group_by
    [resource.project_id, resource.location, resource.cluster_name,
     resource.container_name],
    [value_restart_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.restart_count)]

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes'
| filter (metric.memory_type == 'non-evictable')
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_mean: mean(value.used_bytes)]
| every 1m

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| filter (metric.memory_type == 'non-evictable')
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_mean: mean(value.used_bytes)]
| every 1m

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time'
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/pod/network/received_bytes_count'
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'kubernetes.io/pod/network/received_bytes_count'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/pod/network/sent_bytes_count'
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

{ fetch k8s_container
  | metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/kube_pod_status_phase'
  | add [cluster: resource.cluster_name]
  | group_by 1m, [value_phase_mean: mean(value.kube_pod_status_phase)]
  | every 1m
  | group_by [metric.phase, resource.project_id, resource.location, cluster],
      [value_phase_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_phase_mean)]
; fetch prometheus_target
  | metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/kube_pod_status_phase/gauge'
  | add [cluster: resource.cluster]
  | group_by 1m, [value_phase_mean: mean(value.gauge)]
  | every 1m
  | group_by [metric.phase, resource.project_id, resource.location, cluster],
      [value_phase_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_phase_mean)] }
| union

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_utilization'
| group_by 1m, [value_request_utilization_mean: mean(value.request_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_utilization'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| group_by 1m, [value_request_utilization_mean: mean(value.request_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/limit_utilization'
| group_by 1m, [value_limit_utilization_mean: mean(value.limit_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/memory/limit_utilization'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| group_by 1m, [value_limit_utilization_mean: mean(value.limit_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_utilization'
| group_by 1m, [value_request_utilization_mean: mean(value.request_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_utilization'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| group_by 1m, [value_request_utilization_mean: mean(value.request_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/limit_utilization'
| group_by 1m, [value_limit_utilization_mean: mean(value.limit_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/limit_utilization'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| group_by 1m, [value_limit_utilization_mean: mean(value.limit_utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'kubernetes.io/anthos/pod/volume/utilization'
| group_by 1m, [value_utilization_mean: mean(value.utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'kubernetes.io/pod/volume/utilization'
 filter (resource.cluster_name =~ '^(awsClusters|azureClusters)/.*$')
| group_by 1m, [value_utilization_mean: mean(value.utilization)]
| every 1m
| scale '%'
